title: P_C_TEMPORAL<Iso8601_time>
description:
ISO 8601-compatible constraint on instances of Time. There is no validity flag 
for  hour', since it must always be by definition mandatory in order to have a 
sensible time at all. Syntax expressions of instances of this class include  HH:??:xx  
(time with optional minutes and seconds not allowed).
$comments: Defined in P_aom2 IM, abstract, inherits from P_C_TEMPORAL

rm_type_name.description: Reference model type that this node corresponds to.

occurrences.description: Occurrences of this object node in the data, under the owning attribute. Upper limit can only be greater than 1 if owning attribute has a cardinality of more than 1.

node_id.description: Semantic id of this node, used to differentiate sibling nodes of the same type. Each node_id must be defined in the archetype ontology as a term code.

assumed_value.description: Value to be assumed if none sent in data.

is_enumerated_type_constraint.description: True if this constraint is actually of an enumerated type that conforms to a primitive type, not a primitive.

pattern_constraint.description: Optional alternative constraint in the form of a pattern based on ISO8601. See descendants for details.
